## 1. Randomly generate data on a line 
```{r}
x = runif(100, 5, 15)
y = rnorm(100,x+2*x^2, 50)
```

## Plot the data, fit a parabola
```{r}
plot(xord,yord)
ord=order(x)
xord=x[ord]
yord=y[ord]
lm1 <- lm(yord~xord + I(xord^2))
points(xord, lm1$fitted, type = "l",lwd=3, col = "orange")
```
